column6:
Our cottage is approxamtely 675 sq ft You have your own nicely furnished kitchen and private bathroom. Located in a very quiet residential area. 

We are located:
5 Minutes from Oak Wind Venue
10 minutes from Alvin Community College
30 Minutes to Galveston
30 Minutes to Kemah
30 Minutes to Johnson Space center
35 Minutes to Freeport
45 Minutes to NRG Center
45 Minutes to The Texas Medical Center

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
